short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bee Factory game. This is an idle clicker game themed after honeybees. Tap on the background of the screen to generate active income

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Bee Factory" is an engaging idle clicker game available as a Chrome Extension. The game revolves around the captivating world of honeybees. To progress in the game, players need to tap on the background of the screen to generate active income. This income can be used to purchase various processing equipment and individual hives. These purchases unlock new features and upgrades, allowing players to enhance their bee empire.

The game offers a unique experience where players can immerse themselves in the beekeeping industry. As they tap and generate income, they can strategically invest in different aspects of their beekeeping operation. By purchasing equipment and unlocking upgrades, players can optimize their production and increase their efficiency.

One of the notable features of "Bee Factory" is its availability for free on the unblockedgames.ee website. Players can easily access and enjoy the game without any restrictions. Whether you're a fan of idle clicker games or have an interest in the fascinating world of honeybees, "Bee Factory" offers an entertaining and immersive experience. Start tapping and building your bee empire today!

Note: We add "More Games" in the Popup window shows other game links, making it easier for players to quickly access the game by clicking on the game on the top left of the popup window go up. And on our website https://unblockedgames.ee/
